c74object.name: crow.volts
c74object.digest: Configure inputs and receive CV from crow.
c74object.description: Intended to be loaded as a bpatcher, this graphical user interface talks to any crow object with a send/receive pair: commands_from_crow and commands_to_crow. You can configure the inputs to detect triggers or gates, stream and smooth CV, detect volume, report peak crossings, and calculate the frequency of a connected oscillator (input 1 only).
